name: Ultrastar
description:
///CONTROLS-HOW-TO-PLAY///

WASD - Aim, menu navigation

Space - Jump

K, Enter - Shoot

Enter - Accpet in menu

There are 3 main planets where you can hunt a bounty, after hunting a bounty you get a reward, you can use this reward to buy a better gun to help kill the other bounties. You can buy guns, and pay off the debt at the Store on the left of the planet select screen(grayish objects with blue lights).

///STORY///

(I forgot to add it so here it is ig)

You go into debt and don't have money to pay for it, you have 1 week to collect the money, instead of getting a normal job like any other normal space people, you go bounty hunting.

///OTHER///

I made the game in 6 days, I originally wanted to have a lot more content, a lot more guns, worlds, bosses. But I did not have time for that. I'm still happy with the game atleast this time I actually made something playable lol.

///CREDITS///

Mini font - Kenney

Everything else - me
